channel.title: How random is random?
channel.description:
Hi all,
I am wondering how the random system works. I have this line in my script with a huge random
CMouse (20,160,900,500,true);
but all I ever see is the mouse clicking on the 20,160 spot.
Is the pointer moving to the start coordinates and the click occurring in the random area? Do I have an error? Or is there some other explanation?
Thanks in advance :)
Edit:
Well I have answered my own question :cool:
I replaced all the Cmouse and CMMouse commands with Mmouse and a click procedure. Now everything is behaving as I wanted it to :)
It looks like the setCMouse random function is broken in some wayâ€¦ :(
Altho as this is my 1st attempt at scripting I might just have screwed it up â€¦. :rolleyes:
Has anyone else had this issue?
Fink

item.description:

Well, SRL is the only include to use which is the least scriptable to get you banned in RS.

item.title: How random is random?
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

Are you using SRL include? Or are you just using short terms of the commands?

Anyways… A little bit off topic --> Its wonderful to see how some people still use edit button, nice nice.

P.S. Haven’t got any problems with random features.

item.title: How random is random?
item.dc:creator: @Fink Fink
item.description:
@Fink wrote:

Hi all,

I am wondering how the random system works. I have this line in my script with a huge random

CMouse (20,160,900,500,true);

but all I ever see is the mouse clicking on the 20,160 spot.

Is the pointer moving to the start coordinates and the click occurring in the random area? Do I have an error? Or is there some other explanation?

Thanks in advance

Edit:

Well I have answered my own question

I replaced all the Cmouse and CMMouse commands with Mmouse and a click procedure. Now everything is behaving as I wanted it to

It looks like the setCMouse random function is broken in some wayâ€¦

Altho as this is my 1st attempt at scripting I might just have screwed it up â€¦. :rolleyes:
